introCard.title: Become a Funded Trader
introCard.description: Pass the evaluation and get funded up to $2,000,000

items.description: The Phase 1 challenge is the first step of the Evaluation Process lasting 30 days. Prove your trading skills and discipline in observing the Trading Objectives.
items.title: Basic Challenge

items.description: The Phase 2 challenge is the second step of the Evaluation Process. You need to succeed here to advance into the Verification stage lasting 60 days. Prove the consistency of your trading skills and adapt to your risk review by experts.
items.title: Advanced Challenge
Get Funded
items.description: You are now a trader of the 1000 Plus capital Proprietary Trading firm. Trade responsibly and consistently and receive 70% of your profits. If you consistently generate profits on your 1000 Plus Account, we can scale your account according to our Scaling Plan.

menu.title: Process Overview
menu.description: Different stages and parameters for the challenges

productInfo.title: Track and Adapt
productInfo.description: Get access to our trade tracking and journaling application so you review your progress after every single trade and make sure you dont falter on the path to become a funded trader.

productInfo.title: Support throughout your journey to become a Funded Trader
